Ressa was a female individual who lived during the days of the Old Republic. She was the queen of the planet Drezzi for an amount of time prior to the year 3954 BBY. During Ressa's reign, her homeworld was conquered by the resurgent Sith Empire. After the Sith took the planet, Ressa's husband was executed. However, the lives of her and her children were spared by Sith Lord Darth Nyriss. In gratitude for Nyriss's actions, Ressa gave her a holoprojection as a gift. Sometime later, Sith Pureblood Sechel told Sith Lord Scourge the tale behind the holoprojection as Sechel took the latter to meet with Nyriss in her stronghold on the Sith world Dromund Kaas.
Although her husband was killed, Queen Ressa was still thankful to Darth Nyriss for not executing her and her children and for treating the royal family with mercy.
Ressa was first mentioned in the second chapter of the novel The Old Republic: Revan. The book was written by Drew Karpyshyn and was released by Del Rey on November 15, 2011.
